ç°åœ¨æˆ‘éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºèŠå¤©é¡µé¢ç»„ä»¶å’Œç›¸å…³çš„æœåŠ¡ã€‚è®©æˆ‘å…ˆåˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªèŠå¤©å®¤ä¸»é¡µç»„ä»¶ï¼Œç„¶ååˆ›å»º API æœåŠ¡ã€‚</details></think>

```diff
  <script setup lang="ts">
- import TheWelcome from '../components/TheWelcome.vue'
+ import { ref, onMounted, nextTick } from 'vue'
+ import { marked } from 'marked'
+ import hljs from 'highlight.js'
+ import 'highlight.js/styles/github-dark.css'
+ import { chatWithAI } from '@/services/api'
+ 
+ // å“åº”å¼æ•°æ®
+ const memoryId = ref<number>(0)
+ const messages = ref<Array<{
+   type: 'user' | 'ai'
+   content: string
+   timestamp: Date
+ }>>([])
+ const inputMessage = ref('')
+ const isLoading = ref(false)
+ const isTyping = ref(false)
+ const messagesContainer = ref<HTMLElement>()
+ const messageInput = ref<HTMLTextAreaElement>()
+ 
+ // åˆå§‹åŒ–
+ onMounted(() => {
+   // ç”Ÿæˆéšæœºä¼šè¯ID
+   memoryId.value = Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000)
+   
+   // æ·»åŠ æ¬¢è¿æ¶ˆæ¯
+   messages.value.push({
+     type: 'ai',
+     content: 'æ‚¨å¥½ï¼æˆ‘æ˜¯AIç¼–ç¨‹å°åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œå¾ˆé«˜å…´ä¸ºæ‚¨è§£ç­”ç¼–ç¨‹å­¦ä¹ å’Œæ±‚èŒé¢è¯•ç›¸å…³çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚è¯·å‘Šè¯‰æˆ‘æ‚¨æƒ³äº†è§£ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ',
+     timestamp: new Date()
+   })
+ })
+ 
+ // é…ç½® marked
+ marked.setOptions({
+   highlight: function(code, lang) {
+     if (lang && hljs.getLanguage(lang)) {
+       try {
+         return hljs.highlight(code, { language: lang }).value
+       } catch (err) {
+         console.error('ä»£ç é«˜äº®é”™è¯¯:', err)
+       }
+     }
+     return hljs.highlightAuto(code).value
+   },
+   breaks: true,
+   gfm: true
+ })
+ 
+ // æ¸²æŸ“ Markdown
+ const renderMarkdown = (content: string) => {
+   try {
+     return marked(content)
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('Markdownæ¸²æŸ“é”™è¯¯:', error)
+     return content
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ ¼å¼åŒ–æ—¶é—´
+ const formatTime = (date: Date) => {
+   return date.toLocaleTimeString('zh-CN', {
+     hour: '2-digit',
+     minute: '2-digit'
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // è‡ªåŠ¨è°ƒæ•´textareaé«˜åº¦
+ const autoResize = () => {
+   if (messageInput.value) {
+     messageInput.value.style.height = 'auto'
+     messageInput.value.style.height = messageInput.value.scrollHeight + 'px'
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ // æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
+ const scrollToBottom = () => {
+   nextTick(() => {
+     if (messagesContainer.value) {
+       messagesContainer.value.scrollTop = messagesContainer.value.scrollHeight
+     }
+   })
+ }
+ 
+ // å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯
+ const sendMessage = async () => {
+   if (!inputMessage.value.trim() || isLoading.value) return
+ 
+   const userMessage = inputMessage.value.trim()
+   inputMessage.value = ''
+   
+   // é‡ç½®textareaé«˜åº¦
+   if (messageInput.value) {
+     messageInput.value.style.height = 'auto'
+   }
+ 
+   // æ·»åŠ ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯
+   messages.value.push({
+     type: 'user',
+     content: userMessage,
+     timestamp: new Date()
+   })
+ 
+   scrollToBottom()
+   isLoading.value = true
+   isTyping.value = true
+ 
+   try {
+     // æ·»åŠ AIæ¶ˆæ¯å ä½ç¬¦
+     messages.value.push({
+       type: 'ai',
+       content: '',
+       timestamp: new Date()
+     })
+ 
+     const aiMessageIndex = messages.value.length - 1
+ 
+     // è°ƒç”¨SSEæ¥å£
+     await chatWithAI(memoryId.value, userMessage, (chunk: string) => {
+       // æ›´æ–°AIæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
+       messages.value[aiMessageIndex].content += chunk
+       scrollToBottom()
+     })
+ 
+   } catch (error) {
+     console.error('å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯å¤±è´¥:', error)
+     // ç§»é™¤å¤±è´¥çš„æ¶ˆæ¯
+     messages.value.pop()
+     // æ·»åŠ é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯
+     messages.value.push({
+       type: 'ai',
+       content: 'æŠ±æ­‰ï¼Œå‘ç”Ÿäº†é”™è¯¯ï¼Œè¯·ç¨åé‡è¯•ã€‚',
+       timestamp: new Date()
+     })
+   } finally {
+     isLoading.value = false
+     isTyping.value = false
+     scrollToBottom()
+   }
+ }
  </script>
  
  <template>
-   <main>
-     <TheWelcome />
-   </main>
+   <div class="chat-container">
```

```diff
+ export const chatWithAI = async (
+   memoryId: number, 
+   message: string, 
+   onChunk: (chunk: string) => void
+ ): Promise<void> => {
+   return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
+     // æ„å»º URL å‚æ•°
+     const params = new URLSearchParams({
+       memoryId: memoryId.toString(),
+       message: message
+     })
+

+

+       try {
+         // è§£æ SSE æ•°æ®
+         const data = event.data
+         
+         // å¦‚æœæ”¶åˆ°ç»“æŸä¿¡å·ï¼Œå…³é—­è¿æ¥

+           resolve()

+         eventSource.close()
+         reject(error)
+       }
+     }
+

+       console.error('SSE è¿æ¥é”™è¯¯:', error)
+       eventSource.close()

+       }
+     }, 60000) // 60ç§’è¶…æ—¶
+   })
```

- # ai-chat-app
- 
- This template should help get you started developing with Vue 3 in Vite.
- 
- ## Recommended IDE Setup
- 
- [VSCode](https://code.visualstudio.com/) + [Volar](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Vue.volar) (and disable Vetur).
- 
- ## Type Support for `.vue` Imports in TS
- 
- TypeScript cannot handle type information for `.vue` imports by default, so we replace the `tsc` CLI with `vue-tsc` for type checking. In editors, we need [Volar](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Vue.volar) to make the TypeScript language service aware of `.vue` types.
- 
- ## Customize configuration
- 
- See [Vite Configuration Reference](https://vite.dev/config/).
- 
- ## Project Setup
- 
- ```sh

+ ## åç«¯æ¥å£
+ 
+ åº”ç”¨éœ€è¦è¿æ¥åˆ° SpringBoot åç«¯æœåŠ¡ï¼Œæ¥å£ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š
+ 
+ - **åŸºç¡€åœ°å€**: `http://localhost:8080/api`
+ - **èŠå¤©æ¥å£**: `GET /ai/chat`
+   - å‚æ•°: `memoryId` (ä¼šè¯ID), `message` (ç”¨æˆ·æ¶ˆæ¯)
+   - å“åº”: Server-Sent Events æµå¼æ•°æ®

+ ### åç«¯æ¥å£ç¤ºä¾‹

+ ```java
+ @RestController
+ @RequestMapping("/ai")
+ public class AiController {
+ 
+     @GetMapping("/chat")
+     public Flux<ServerSentEvent<String>> chat(int memoryId, String message) {
+         return aiCodeHelperService.chatStream(memoryId, message)
+                 .map(chunk -> ServerSentEvent.<String>builder()
+                         .data(chunk).build());

+ }

+ ## é¡¹ç›®ç»“æ„

+ â”œâ”€â”€ assets/            # é™æ€èµ„æº
+ â””â”€â”€ main.ts           # åº”ç”¨å…¥å£

+ ## ä½¿ç”¨è¯´æ˜
